lender.name: brenda
lender.loan_because: It is amazing to me the small amount of money that I would spend on a family meal, could actually mean a business venture for someone. I think its incredible and I want to help people suceed in obtaining their goal as a successful business person. No one is looking for a hand out, but for a hand up. I think its great.
lender.occupational_info: I assist lawyers with their day to day work. Filing papers in court rooms and in Washington.

lender.name: Ryo
lender.loan_because: I have always appreciated all the help I have received from people. If it wasn't for them I wouldn't have been able to get this far. I am glad to be able to give back.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I owned my own business. I know how helpful a loan can be.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now but I used to install heating and air conditioning systems.

lender.name: ray
lender.loan_because: why not?
lender.occupational_info: i work for myself. i grow and sell garden plants.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I understand
lender.occupational_info: I work many different jobs, because I love people, teaching, and Hard work :)

lender.name: Jacqueline & Paul
lender.loan_because: My sister and brother-in-law gave us $100 this past Christmas, with a challenge to 'make a difference in someone's life'....and here we are!

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed enough to be able to give back.

lender.name: Gavin
lender.loan_because: It's better to keep money moving through the economy than to sit on it.
lender.occupational_info: Protection of Ontario's rare tallgrass prairie habitats.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I want to see hard-working people succeed, especially in scientifically, technologically, and medically driven projects!
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and build the computers and software that runs a group of local hospitals and medical clinics.

lender.name: Teddy
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in education, helping teachers unlock the potential of their students to change the world around them.

lender.name: Matthew Meadows
lender.loan_because: this is a unique way to not only connect with people around the world, but also to help them improve their lives and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish, he eats for a day. Teach a man for a fish he eats for the rest of his life. Someone just needs to help out sometimes to pay for the rod.
lender.occupational_info: Self Help Film and Book publishing

lender.name: Robert Knapp
lender.loan_because: I believe that lack of initial capital should not be a barrier to success.
lender.occupational_info: For paid work, I write software for hospitals. Outside of that, I volunteer in an adult education program. We help students obtain a high school level education so they can get better jobs. The program is free for the students, and they can just walk in off the street and sign up.

lender.name: Louis
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor who treats children with diabetes

lender.name: Dudley
lender.loan_because: I should

lender.name: Bobbie Sue
lender.loan_because: To help someone reach for success is.... an honor.
lender.occupational_info: I am an executive assistant for a large global organization.

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: I want to leave this world Knowing I did more for Others than I did for Myself!

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: people need a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Putting things in the right place using assets the way they are built.

lender.name: Beavis
lender.loan_because: like once someone gave me some nachos. it was cool. and i want to get some chicks
lender.occupational_info: i sit at a computer and look at thingies n stuff.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I've been more fortunate than many others and want to go down giving more than I take.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a personal assistant/schedule manager for the president/founder of a children's animation studio in NYC.

lender.name: Liria
lender.loan_because: I've never been able to get a loan. It feels pretty great to be able to give one instead!

lender.name: Anthony Victorio
lender.loan_because: I have been given a lot of opportunities in this world and this is my way of paying back. I'd like to give other opportunities to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info:
I manage a network of websites. I build, design and do a little bit of writing (which I'm trying to do more of). These sites include:
www.omniai910.com www.sushidallas.org www.p90xresults.com
You can read more about me and what I do at my personal website listed below.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We all need to leverage our strength
lender.occupational_info: Counting beans

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Set up professional internet businesses.

lender.name: Randy Ray
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate an internet marketing firm.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: we need to cut out the big banks and governmental strings which are traditionally attached to aid from the west to LDCs. Doing it this way means that the money goes where it's needed. Also, small businesses are more integrated into their local community and far less likely to be damaging to the environment than big multi-national companies, and that is very important to me
lender.occupational_info: I work for a charity which protects biodiversity (plants, animals and habitats) in the north of england.

lender.name: YPO KC
lender.loan_because: Some people have so much and others have so little. I am thankful and hope to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am part of a business organization which brings businessmen and their families together to enhance both their business and personal goals.

lender.name: dillon
lender.loan_because: i feel powerless to fix the systems that make the world so imbalanced and making Kiva loans is something i can do to help others directly and immediately

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of women to care for themselves and those they love. Sometimes we just need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, studying to become a university professor. I want to do research about social justice and gender issues, as related to computer science and related fields.

lender.name: DePaul
lender.occupational_info: Founded in 1898, DePaul University is the largest Catholic university in the nation and the largest private institution in Chicago, serving over 23,000 students who reflect a broad diversity of ethnic, religious, geographic and economic backgrounds.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I loan on people I believe in.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: this is a terrific idea that was long overdue. It makes ME feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant in the middle of Time Square NYC. We served meals to travelers from all over the world. It's a family place thats fun for people young and old. It's like an amusement park and restaurant in one.

lender.name: stepan
lender.loan_because: because. I robbed need to install more modern system of alarming. and purchase equipment for diesel workshop
lender.occupational_info: I do restoration parts in diesel engine

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: We have so much to give

lender.name: clinton
lender.loan_because: I think geography shouldn't determine one's opportunities.

lender.name: Barry
lender.occupational_info: I like to create websites that help make the internet a better place.

lender.name: Chynna
lender.loan_because: I care. A lot. I don't have a lot to spare, but I want to help make a difference. I really think microfinance is going to make a big difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Working for a small dot-com internet venture that focuses on getting businesses set up with video online.

lender.name: Depaul
lender.loan_because: DePaul's career-focused MBA program for working professionals has earned a top-10 rating a dozen times in the magazine's annual rankings.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people the opportunity to work, who otherwise would not be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a university student and work as a ranch hand.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with funds and I want to make sure they get to his children!

lender.name: ROBERT
lender.loan_because: BECAUSE I CARE
lender.occupational_info: HELP PEOPLE EVERYDAY

lender.name: Michael S.
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people meet their goals and make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I am an administrator at a university in the United States.

lender.name: matt
lender.loan_because: I loan because nothing worse than having a dream and no opportunity to pursue it.

lender.name: Chris And Hannah
lender.loan_because: We want to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: Dad is an attorney. Daughter is a student.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I feel so blessed with my life, that is important that I give some of the blessings to others. Because it also makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I make my own necklaces, bracelets and earrings. I use different stones, beads and wires.

lender.name: Tony and friends
lender.loan_because: my friends and I loan to make a small difference.

lender.name: Covert
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to people from many other countries around the world.

lender.name: Alessandro
lender.loan_because: I am a Freemason.
lender.occupational_info: I try to understand and explain how the human brain works.

lender.name: Russell
lender.occupation: Just someone who tries to make a difference

lender.name: Lorne
lender.occupational_info: I manage groups of people, and help them work together to make video games.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start form scratch. I want to give opportunities to anyone I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a team of volunteers to help children understand the love of God.

lender.name: Stewart
lender.loan_because: Hard-working people in developing countries deserve access to capital.
lender.occupational_info: Making computer systems work.

lender.name: Esther
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to help others that are making an effort to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure airplane travel is safe, expeditious and efficient.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being able to help people who are working to help themselves.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a helping hand from time to time...
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student studing to become a Chartered Accountant.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I have been more than successful in my business endeavours and wish to contribute to somebody who doesn't have access to some of the social programs people in North America are entitled to.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a natural gas production company, making sure all of our automated systems keep running properly.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.loan_because: Its really fun to hear about the reports of the people, and that your moneys going to some thing good, and I can hang with my friends =)
lender.occupational_info: I play lacrosse. Its totally awesome! Im good at defense and i've been on a select traveling team for the last two years! I live for lacrosse.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: the only lasting solution to poverty is employment.
lender.occupational_info: I work on cargo ships.

lender.name: Tonya
lender.loan_because: It feels right to!...
lender.occupational_info: Costume design for film and television :)

lender.name: Ciaran
lender.loan_because: the people at Kiva have made it so easy to do so that I feel confident that the money is really making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a scientist by training with experience in a commercial setting. More recently I am trying to start my own company based on an idea that is nothing to do with my professional qualifications. Its exciting!

lender.name: Surath
lender.loan_because: I want to prove my self.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing my success with others.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: By accident of birth, I was born in a wealthy country and have had all the advantages. Now I want to help others not so lucky to have a life of dignity and prosperity.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves the money to follow their dreams, even if they seem crazy. Especially if they seem crazy.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a newspaper. It's more or less the same all over the world.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: such a small amount to me can make such a big difference to someone else. how can I not?

lender.name: Erina
lender.loan_because: I like to know that in a small way I am sending a message of friendship in a distant part of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a family business with my dad, brother and many of my cousins. We wholesale hockey equipment to shops across the US

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it's good.
lender.occupational_info: computer stuff

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I believe that i am blessed so that i can be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I setup and run sound systems (microphones, speakers, etc.) for musical events, and work in retail.

lender.name: Jey
lender.loan_because: I love.
lender.occupational_info:
Graphic design is fun. More fun is my blues band, The B Players. :)
Peace, love, good music.

lender.name: Sophie
lender.loan_because: This is a fabulous way to come together, learn more about each other and share our world.
lender.occupational_info: I write nature programmes for TV.

lender.name: Michael Six
lender.loan_because:
Mahatma Gandhi said it best "be the change you want to see in the world."
I live within abundance and share it with the world.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I believe in the empowerment of people. God has blessed me greatly in my life, and by his grace I would like to play a part in creating opportunities for others.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: Microcredits to female entrepreneurs is one of the most effective and promising ways to empower women and fight poverty around the world.

lender.name: FRANCES ANNE
lender.loan_because: I need to start a business .2years ago i got breastcancer and i lost my job. I am married with 3 children and they all go to school, so my new bussiness will help supplement for my medication and upkeep.
lender.occupational_info: none

lender.name: Sanjay
lender.occupation: They all me the king of spin!
lender.loan_because: It is important to give. The day we stop giving, is the day that we loose the natural ability to give. I give for very selfish reasons! I give because it makes me a better person, it helps me to remain a positive, energetic and happy human being. I give because we all should give sometimes, and as cliched as it may sound, we gain as much from the giving as the person who recieves.
lender.occupational_info:
My work? Wow that is a long and boring desciption that I really am not going to inflict on you!
Instead I would like to thank Ben over at Enigin for showing me this website, I hadn't heard of it before, and it is really excellent. I look forward to being able to use it to donate.

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: I believe in my sisters overseas and pray that they may know that there are people all over the world who believe in them and a God in heaven who wants to support and love them them!

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: Having worked for various charities over time, I personally think that it is incredibly important not only to give less fortunate communities funding but also give them the personal chance to improve their living circumstances. This is one of the best and most effective ways that I have found online to be able to do this. I think that every person has something to contribute to the world economy, and this enables people who may not have previously had the chance to be able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Publishing is really great and quite self-explanatory, but my other passion is art work. I really enjoy technically drawing as well as creating images for authors and am illustrating a series of children's books right now. I think that this and publishing balance each other out quite well and I am always excited to go to work, no matter what it is I am doing that day!

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do and the way forward for global cooperation ( yes I am naive)
lender.occupational_info: supporting the learning of 16+ yr olds who have mild learning difficulties.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because:
it is important I guess. I have to be honest, I'm not very good at all the philosophical stuff. I dont really read that stuff, and Ive never really got it. What I understand, is what is real and in front of me. If there is someone who can show me otherwise I will listen. I know that there is a lot that I dont know. This isnt really making any sense is it? Look, Ive never been good at writing these things. Basically Im donating because this makes sense to me. People across the globe can use what is a small amount of money to me and build their entire lives around it? This seems brilliant to me. So Im going to chip some money in and hope that it does some good to some people that I dont know and will never meet. I dont need to meet them to want to help them, I think that simply being shown it and actually being given a chance to do something is really good. I find the news a little depressing, you are shown loads of rubbish that is happening out there in the world but you are offered no way of doing anything about it. Here at least here we are given the option to help.
I guess that is all I mean when I say what is in front of me. I am just a very practical person. This Kiva seems like a good practical solution to a world problem. I want to get behind that in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I get to make cool and funky images, and I get paid for it! When I am not doing that I am doing alot of coding and building.

lender.name: Pierre-Alain
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: Business Development for Asset Management company in Switzerland.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: its good to give. It is really good to give. I am lucky to live in a country where I have never been truely poor. I'm not saying that I was born into a "rich" family or anything, but what I can say is that fundementally I never had to struggle to eat. I have never been in a position where I have wondered if I am going to be able to afford to put food in my mouth at night. This is why I am priveilidged. I give because it is both helping others to achieve what I have always had, and because it reminds me of how lucky I am.
lender.occupational_info: I love my work. I love what I do and the people that I get to work with. As I said, I am a very luck man.

lender.name: Cathrine Lind
lender.loan_because: I believe that people can change their dreams into something great if just somebody believes in them.
lender.occupational_info: I am business entrepreneur with 3 companys, two in Sweden and one in Morocco. Business is my life.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: others have been generous to me in times of need.
lender.occupational_info: I try and teach children from a wide range of backgrounds to see the beauty of the world in their lives through learning about art.

lender.name: lilmammal
lender.loan_because: I am a humanist. If I can do any little thing to improve the life and dignity of another living being, I feel compelled. We're the only ones who can help each other and ourselves. We're in this together!

lender.name: jerry
lender.loan_because: i think that microfinance is a great idea
lender.occupational_info: i create custom websites for small businesses

lender.name: Brooks
lender.loan_because: "I share because I care."

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupational_info: I work as an English-Polish and Polish-English interpreter at conferences, congresses, negotiations, and other events.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: Hey, let's face it, we don't all have the same opportunity in life - just based on where we were born. I am fortunate and would like to do my part to help others help themselves through enterprise, commerce and entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I have a business selling Wholesale Jewelry to small businesses all around the world. Mostly silver jewelry with sem-precious gemstones.

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: Step by step, little by little we can lift up the Worlds People. There is plenty for everyone. We dont have to be a world of haves and have nots.

lender.name: Mark Daniel
lender.loan_because: I love each of you...and would count it a high honor to be a part of your success.
lender.occupational_info: I work in advertising - in helping share messages with people across the world.

lender.name: Jordan-Louise
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student, currently studying AS Psychology and AS English Language. Though I hope to join the army as a Veterinary Technician at some point.

lender.name: Zachary Smith Music
lender.loan_because: I feel that God has blessed me with a lot. It would not be right to keep it for myself when I know that others have needs. I also like the idea that people on this site are not just looking for a handout, but instead are working hard and trying to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I play guitar and sing.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I want to, and i can.
lender.occupational_info: I design micro-chips.

lender.name: austin
lender.loan_because: who knew $25 could change someones life...

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: Stewart
lender.loan_because: I can help change someone's life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I keep the computers my company owns working.

lender.name: Rarr
lender.loan_because: Dinosaurs like to try to help others as well. We're not all ravaging carnivores, you know.
lender.occupational_info: When not hunting herbivores, I work to help sell computer software to clients.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: This will change a persons life, I want to teach my childern how to give to the less fortunate. I love the fact that this goes to hard working people who just need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I have the best job in the world. I get to stay home and watch my children grow.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to say I am helping someone do something better for themselves
lender.occupational_info: I track computer items and how they interact and communicate

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have opportunity to make be self-sufficient and make the most of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home to raise two wonderful young boys. I strive to reduce our family's negative impact on the world, to be more self-sufficent, to live healthy and clean, and for our lives to be simple and meaningful.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to support entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: Private wealth investment management through Venture Capital Trusts.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I may not be able to change the world, but I can make a dent...
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney at a small law firm in Orange County, CA practicing in the areas of taxation, business transactions and corporate law. I deal with a broad variety of legal matters, including business entity structuring and formation, mergers and acquisitions, federal and state tax litigation, corporate financings, and estate planning.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: My boss showed me the website and it brought me to tears. It's such an amazing and beautiful project!

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: The people inspire me.
lender.occupational_info: I work for myself doing graphic design work while I am in school studying nonprofit management.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I can. And others need it.
lender.occupational_info: I help others with everything from day-to-day finances to long-range planning.

lender.name: Iris
lender.loan_because: I don't have millions to give but I hope to make a difference on a small scale. Also, this helps me connect with people across the globe in a very tangible way.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures of community events for a weekly newspaper.

lender.name: Cody Vance
lender.occupational_info: I am a homeless missionary. I am based out of Houston Texas. I bring the word of hope to the oppressed sleeping in the streets of Houston. I also travel the country going to different churches bringing the story of the oppressed to the churches ears. My ministry is called "Much Love Ministries". I am seeking financial help to expand the ministry.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: It is great to collaborate with others to help people to make a (re)start. A small investment with a big effect.
lender.occupational_info: Leading with the elders of the church a Baptist Church in the country side.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a better life.
lender.occupational_info: College professor

lender.name: andrea
lender.loan_because: I'm poor myself and I know what it's like.
lender.occupational_info: when opportunity knocks I answer,and i hear it knocking,more and more.

lender.name: Deborah & Sam
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. We just want to give a little help to those who are trying to work and provide for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We are both teachers at a community college. We also do radio and tv commercials.

lender.name: Gillian
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be in the position to help.

lender.name: Lucas
lender.occupational_info: I am attending SUNY Cobleskill for dairy production management. I will receive my Associates degree in the spring of 2011. I will then be attending Cornell University for Dairy science where i will obtain my Bachelors degree.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of women helping women around the world.
lender.occupational_info: First and foremost I am a mother. I work hard to raise thoughtful, considerate, and kind children. Being a mother is the most challenging job I have ever had!

lender.name: Marta y Rego
lender.loan_because: We are entrepeneurs too, so we know how dificult is to start a business.

lender.name: William Tuning
lender.loan_because: I believe that everone can make a difference accross the world with just a few dollars... I remember when I first started my own business many years ago how hard it was to raise capital. Had it not been for a good friend that believed in me and made me an interest free loan, which I paid back in less than one year, I would not be in the place I am today. I believe in paying it forward and using what God has blessed me with to share with others in any way I can.....
lender.occupational_info: I make my living arranging home loans for residents of Washington State in the United States of America which enable them to finance the purchase of their homes.

lender.name: lawrence
lender.loan_because: I have a nice family, two kids, two dogs, a wife and comfortable home. This is my way of giving back.
lender.occupational_info: Litigated property & casualty insurance claims adjuster, employed by an insurance co.

lender.name: Elliot
lender.loan_because: We're in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I make web sites and software to be used on the internet to help small business get exposure.

lender.name: Rev. Ricardo Gonzales
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to find themselves, not only for themselves but for their business and their communities. I want them to grow and prosper and become better people, so in their life time, they can helps others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Spiritual Counselor helping people find there message or the God within them. I teach them the way to opening themselves to God or High Spirit for a better life.

lender.name: ALICIA
lender.occupation: Head Global Benefits for a international law firm.

lender.name: Strat
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I make video films for companies.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be a blessing
lender.occupational_info: I solve difficult problems

lender.name: Rick & Bernie
lender.loan_because: Life is a learning curve, its not about me me me, its about helping each other, God Bless.
lender.occupational_info: Self employed

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to see a more equatable world. I believe in people who want to make a living for themselves, and I enjoy being a part of an organization that supports people in their individual ventures that they themselves run. I don't believe in charities that just hand out money, but am very pleased to support a charity that takes funds to help others make their own lives better. I also enjoy that on this website, when the businesses earn the money back, you can then donate it to another worthwhile cause on the site. And in the future I hope to see more of these types of business practices applied to charities.
lender.occupational_info: Information, information, information delivery of Enigin's energy saving solution

lender.name: AmyJ
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky to have the chances that I do and it doesn't hurt to spread some opportunity around.

lender.loan_because: its necessary and I believe in it. the world should become a peaceful and better place for all of us.

lender.occupational_info: I help business and universities to work together for the greater good.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone has the potential to achieve greatness, only some lack the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I study political economy, international development, and social innovation.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I believe the concept of helping people help themselves is a worthy venture.
lender.occupational_info: I am self-employed as a printer, producing brochures, forms, business cards, etc. for businesses and individuals in my community.

lender.name: Michael

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: Do unto others as you would have them do unto you.

lender.occupational_info: I sit in an office all day solving computer problems for my company. (And sometimes creating them.)

lender.name: Adrain
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.

lender.name: Brynn
lender.loan_because: I am a follower of Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Pat

lender.name: angelina
lender.loan_because: I started my business as a single mum and i know how hard it is to get a business of the ground. I hope another family could benefit from the loan, and experience the joy that comes from being able to provide for ones family.
lender.occupational_info: I have a website that sells mosquito nets and bed canopies, all over the world.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because:
each loan has the potential to change individual borrowers' lives for the better, but also those of their families, their communities--and maybe even the world.
Plus, lending helps me keep in touch with how wealthy I really am, and how much I do have. I loan as an expression of faith in other people's ability to transform their lives, and from gratitude to those people who have had similar faith in me.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: It just makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: Having spent sometime working in Eastern Europe and other emerging markets I decided I wanted to take some time to travel and see more of the world. I am currently travelling in SE Asia and then onto South America.

lender.name: Ellen & Amanda
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help multiple people, various amounts of time.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others as best as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help young children with physical and cognitive disabilities learn to use their bodies better. I have worked with children with disabilities for 30 years.

lender.name: christy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed.

lender.name: jonathan
lender.loan_because: Someone once told me..Throwing large amounts of money at a problem will never solve the problem. All people need is a start or a helping hand. I dont see this as charity, more enabling someone to reach their own goals with pride & dignity.
lender.occupational_info: Electronic Engineer / IT.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to glorify God with my life and He has called us to take care of the poor, the widow, the orphan and take action, when we can.
lender.occupational_info: Jesus is the way, the truth and the life. No one can come to the Father except through HIM! I want to show God's love to the world, and show them the way to the Father.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to give other members of our global community a chance to create a life for themselves that isn't reliant on welfare or handouts.
lender.occupational_info: Sell and ensure the delivery of complex IT systems to government which are used to deliver HR, finance and business-specific services to employees and customers.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to help in any way that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse for animals.

lender.name: follettEdSvcs89
lender.occupational_info: For over 130 years , Follett Educational Services has helped K-12 schools nationwide stretch their classroom budget with incredible savings on pre-owned textbooks and brand-new supplemental materials across all major publishers, grades, and subjects.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: nina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of people.
lender.occupational_info: I assist Pharmacists in dispensing medications in a retail pharmacy.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Lending is my way of helping people help themselves. I find happiness in helping others, and I believe in the old saying that if you give someone a fish you feed them for a day, but if you teach someone to fish you feed them for life.

lender.name: cadex
lender.loan_because: the interest here in bali is too high 3
lender.occupational_info: im working with my own taxi...my home base is in one of the hotel in bali named sanur paradize plaza hotel which is very potential place. i also drive for my own costumer who travel to bali regulary outside of my home base...during my loan from the bank its ahard life of me...coz of the interest...therefore im joining in kiva...hope that all of you can helping of me....thanks to kiva..and of course all of you in the world

lender.name: dagaanbieding
lender.occupational_info: Aanbiedingvandaag biedt een overzicht van dagaanbiedingen waaronder ibood en 1dayfly

lender.name: C-J Family
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: We are media professionals.

lender.name: Yen-Ming
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: write code.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Ella & Marshall
lender.loan_because: Living in Canada is like winning a lottery. Others may not be so lucky just because of circumstance. Everyone should have a chance to get ahead in their lives regardless of where they live. "it's easy to make a buck, it's a lot harder to make a difference"
lender.occupational_info: I just wrote a book and I write an advice column in a community newspaper. I also work in advertising and with Macintosh computers. Marshall works in the Real Estate business.

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because:
... I have a the dream that all humans of this planet should have a dignified, self-determined and social secured life, within a child-friendly world, without corruption, within an intact environment, without wars ...
Participating in Kiva's idea is a (very, very) small contribution to make this happen.

lender.name: aaron
lender.loan_because: i want to see people raised up and given hope and a purpose that god would bring
lender.occupational_info: working in a supermarket serving customers and doing trolleys

lender.name: Prue
lender.loan_because: its great to help others acheive their goals

lender.name: allhere
lender.loan_because: This site should bring the light in your life. Casino slots gives you the chance to see the beautiful part of life!
lender.occupational_info: free slots, casino slots, slots

lender.name: ANDREA
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who need it most.
lender.occupational_info: take care of businesses' money

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
We wish to assist those with ingenuity, drive and opportunity but without adequate resources.
The structuring of the capital base of any business determines its ability to succeed. As such, we are happy to have the opportunity to share in this process.
lender.occupational_info: Managing Director at a private company.

lender.name: matty tangle
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: good

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: Empowering these women to be able to do more for their families and possibly raise their standing in the community is such a cool idea! I know how important it is to know one is not alone. appreciated!
lender.occupational_info: I try to paint the love I feel for people I see, as well as places I've been. I use watercolors on lovely rag paper to get the effect I desire.

lender.name: Allegra
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student interested in international relations/humanitarian affairs as well as music.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I watched Jessica Jackley interviewed at the Global Leadership Summit this year and I was so blown away by her work and Kiva.org.
lender.occupational_info: I am an actress from Durban, South Africa - I specialize in musicals and comedy. I am a wife and mom to 4 kids. I am in the process of starting a NPO called the Joy Project ( a fund raising, non-profit organization) that will raise money through various theatre shows and the proceeds will go to established organizations that help with impoverished widows and orphans in and around the Durban area.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: great model. a lot more sustainable than just spending money
lender.occupational_info: selling goods on the internet

lender.name: sunshine
lender.loan_because: I would spend $25 dollars on useless things I don't need. I would rather take that money and give it to someone in another country who is trying to rise above circumstance and not be another statistic!
lender.occupational_info: I work for an internet website that sells all natural beauty products

lender.name: Matt and Sarah
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: Matt is a self-employed website designer and developer. Sarah, his wife, is a full-time graduate student, studying to become a speech and language therapist.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: Only we - we ourself - can change the world
lender.occupational_info: I work in a global company to scale up chemical products from lab to manufacturing. Our business are water based polymer binders, replacing solvent based ones - for environments and peoples health sake... My passion is photography.

lender.name: Eliana
lender.loan_because: I have faith in micro-loan economics.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I like inspiring capitalism.

lender.name: tunji
lender.occupational_info: i design and produce inverters, wind turbines and battery chargers

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: This is one of the best ways that I have found to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school English to kids at a private high school in Dallas. I also work on helping some public school kids get into college, as well as lead a club that helps to promote the teaching profession.

lender.name: Rodney Howard
lender.loan_because:
What God Wants Us to Hear by Rodney Howard Browne
Put simply, stick with the evangelizing plan God has sure to praise and use. Don't try and be so creative and adorable that folks miss the truth. No need for unintelligible and crazy substitutes that entertain but barely convict the lost and edify the saved. Will you notice something here? This exhortation isn't addressed to the hearer, it's for the spokesman.
The person that is to do that's the one exclaiming the message. Be ready to do it in season and out of season. Don't get on up and begin with an apology that you didn't quite have sufficient time to prepare.
That doesn't wash." And do so faithfully when it's convenient and when it's not. Sadly , in a shocking number of churches today, God's people are being told what they have to hear rather than what they have to hear. A watered-down gospel may attract gigantic crowds ( for some considerable time ), but it has no never-ending impact. I can't say I have been capable of finding any place in the Scriptures where God expresses the least bit of doubt for drawing numbers.
Enjoyable the curious itching ears of our postmodern audiences is an exercise in futility.
Frankly , I'm going to resume doing exactly that, by God's grace, until the day He calls me home. And I think there is a fast-increasing number of supporters who long for nutritive messages based on the Word of the Lord Almighty not human standpoint. The world urgently needs more Christians with the fervor and faith of Paul. Will you be one of them? Will you reply the charge? If this is the case there's no better time than now to start.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: it's a very simple way of standing up for the causes I believe in./ Es una manera muy simple de apoyar las causas en las que creo.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a public Univeristy. /Trabajo para una universidad publica.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe that capitalism can be a beautiful mechanism that can improve entire communities by tapping the potential of a few motivated individuals. It would be a shame if that motivation turned to frustration because of a lack of adequate investment.
lender.occupational_info: I mostly make websites. More generally, my company is hired by other companies to build difficult pieces of software.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I am really inspired by entrepreneurism the world over
lender.occupational_info: I have the privilege of working for a fantastic charity in the UK that works to alleviate poverty in the UK - we work to give people hope and a future
